medical_history.history_of_present_illness: A month prior to admission, the patient presented with recurrent generalized tonic-clonic seizures, of which the duration and frequency are not specified.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past history of epistaxis, left eye hemorrhage, gum bleeds, iron deficiency anemia, and lower gastrointestinal bleeding. Endoscopy revealed multiple telangiectasia involving the gastroduodenal mucosa and colonic polyps. A colectomy revealed multiple tubulovillous adenomas.
medical_history.family_history: Positive for epistaxis in his mother.
medical_history.social_history: The patient had occupational exposure to potassium permanganate as a reagent for testing water purity and admitted to occasional hand staining.
